thread.section_title: HighWire-hosted journals, sorted by date of last publication
thread.title: BMJ Open Respiratory Research

title: BMJ Open Respiratory Research
text:
Email alerts 
BMJ Open Respiratory Research is an Open Access respiratory and critical care medicine journal published by BMJ. The journal is dedicated to publishing high quality, peer-reviewed, medical research in all disciplines and therapeutic areas of respiratory and critical care medicine. BMJ Open Respiratory Research aims to operate a fast submission and review process with continuous publication online, to ensure timely, up-to-date research is available worldwide. 
BMJ Open Respiratory Research is an official journal of the British Thoracic Society. Latest Content 
Tuberculosis: Evaluation of prediagnosis emergency department presentations in patients with active tuberculosis: the role of chest radiography, risk factors and symptoms (17 January, 2017) 
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease: Decreased left ventricular stroke volume is associated with low-grade exercise tolerance in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (25 January, 2017)
